actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation for payments under home health service grants and making an appropriation for payments under multipurpose senior center grants.

summary.text: Appropriates $7,000,000 out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated as an additional amount for carrying out the home health services provisions of the Health Revenue Sharing and Health Services Act. Appropriates specified sums, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, for making multipurpose senior center grants under the Older Americans Act of 1965.

titles.title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation for payments under home health service grants and making an appropriation for payments under multipurpose senior center grants.
